com.esri.mo2.map.draw
Class ChartSymbol

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.map.draw.BaseSymbol
        |
        +--com.esri.mo2.map.draw.BaseFontSymbol
              |
              +--com.esri.mo2.map.draw.BaseTextSymbol
                    |
                    +--com.esri.mo2.map.draw.ChartSymbol
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Symbol, TextSymbol
public class ChartSymbol
extends BaseTextSymbol

Displays one or more values as either a PIE or BAR chart. Since ChartSymbol is a type of TextSymbol, this symbol is best used with a LabelRenderer and will consequently be positioned according to the LabelEngine.

Values to be charted must be added via addChartValue() prior to rendering. The size of ChartSymbol can be either fixed by calling setSize(), or can be dynamically set using all of the methods setMinSize, setMaxSize, setMinValue ansd setMaxValue. Failure to set all of these will result in no display.

See Also:
LabelEngine, LabelRenderer

Field Detail

CHART_EMPTY_VALUE

public static final int CHART_EMPTY_VALUE
This constant defines the default empty value for back color. Tue default value is -1. This value can be used for pie size or pie value.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

MODE_PIE

public static final int MODE_PIE
This constant defines the pie mode for char symbol.

See Also:
setMode(int), getMode(), Constant Field Values

MODE_BAR

public static final int MODE_BAR
This constant defines the bar mode for char symbol.

See Also:
setMode(int), getMode(), Constant Field Values

DEFAULT_SIZE

public static final int DEFAULT_SIZE
This constant defines the default pie/bar size. The default size is CHART_EMPTY_VALUE or -1. The default size means not assigned.

See Also:
setSize(int), getSize(), setMinSize(int), getMinSize(), setMaxSize(int), getMaxSize(), Constant Field Values

DEFAULT_VALUE

public static final double DEFAULT_VALUE
This constant defines the default pie/bar value. The default value is CHART_EMPTY_VALUE or -1. The default value means not assigned.

See Also:
setMinValue(double), getMinValue(), setMaxValue(double), getMaxValue(), Constant Field Values

prepare

public void prepare(String text,
                    FeatureGeometry fg,
                    Transform transform)
This method provide the parameters for drawing. The method should not be call directly, but label engine only.

Parameters:
text - is a textstring to be drawing
fg - is feature geometry to be labeled
transform - is transform object to describe the current map transform
